sentence: Since  last  month  —  when  Hamas  stormed  into  Israel  and  killed  some  1,200  people  and  captured  about  240  hostages  —  Israel  has  launched  a  devastating  bombing  campaign  on  Gaza  that  has  killed  more  than  11,000  people.

Since  last  month  —  when  Hamas  stormed  into  Israel  and  killed  some  1,200  people  and  captured  about  240  hostages  —  Israel  has  launched  a  devastating  bombing  campaign  on  Gaza  that  has  killed  more  than  11,000  people.
